TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed TextDecorations extends System.Object
public ref class TextDecorations abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组静态预定义文本修饰。

span.span: Provides a set of static predefined text decorations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四种类型的文本修饰： 基线、 上划线、 删除线和下划线。There are four types of text decorations: baseline, overline, strikethrough, and underline. 下面的示例显示了文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文本修饰类型的示例Example of text decoration types ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `textDecorationType` 文本修饰的类型： ， ， ，或。The type of text decoration: , , , or . 使用逗号分隔的值，允许多个修饰。More than one decoration is permitted, with values separated by commas. 此外可以指定"None"，以指示没有任何类型的文本修饰。You can also specify "None" to indicate no type of text decoration. ## Examples 在以下示例中，删除线文本效果使用的默认字体值。In the following example, a strikethrough text decoration uses the default font value. [!code-csharp[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textdecorationsnippets1)] [!code-vb[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textdecorationsnippets1)] [!code-xaml[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#textdecorationsnippets1)] 此外可以指定多个文本修饰的文本相同的文本。You can also specify multiple text decorations for the same text. 在下面的示例、 下划线和上划线文本效果使用相同的文本。In the following example, an underline and overline text decoration are used for the same text. [!code-xaml[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#textdecorationsnippets4)] 可以使用字符串值"None"，指示在任何文本修饰集合。You can use the string value "None" to indicate that there are no text decorations in the collection. 在以下示例中，集合设置为"None"。In the following example, the collection is set to "None". [!code-xaml[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#textdecorationsnippets5)] 可以通过使用从文本中删除所有文本修饰方法。You can remove all text decorations from text by using the method. 在以下示例中，清除集合。In the following example, the collection is cleared. [!code-csharp[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets5a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textdecorationsnippets5a)] [!code-vb[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets5a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textdecorationsnippets5a)] 默认情况下使用对象来显示下划线。By default, uses a object to display an underline. 以下标记示例演示使用和不使用下划线定义：The following markup sample shows a defined with and without an underline: [!code-xaml[Performance#PerformanceSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Performance/CSharp/Hyperlink.xaml#performancesnippet11)] 对象可以是占用实例化，特别是当有许多对象。 objects can be performance intensive to instantiate, particularly if you have many objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：指定是否为超链接添加下划线](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-specify-whether-a-hyperlink-is-underlined.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify Whether a Hyperlink is Underlined](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-specify-whether-a-hyperlink-is-underlined.md).

value.span: 一个表示基线 的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例显示了基线文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following example shows the location of a baseline text decoration relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 基线文本修饰的示例Example of a baseline text decoration

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例显示了删除线文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following example shows the location of a strikethrough text decoration relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 删除线文本修饰的示例Example of a strikethrough text decoration ## Examples 在以下示例中，通过笔用于纯色画笔创建带删除线文本修饰。In the following example, a strikethrough text decoration is created by using solid color brush for the pen. 属性设置为 。The property is set to . [!code-csharp[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textdecorationsnippets1)] [!code-vb[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textdecorationsnippets1)] [!code-xaml[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#textdecorationsnippets1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

value.span: 一个表示下划线 的值。

span.span: A value that represents an underline .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例显示了下划线文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following example shows the location of an underline text decoration relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 下划线文本修饰的示例Example of an underline text decoration 默认情况下使用对象来显示下划线。By default, uses a object to display an underline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：指定是否为超链接添加下划线](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-specify-whether-a-hyperlink-is-underlined.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify Whether a Hyperlink is Underlined](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-specify-whether-a-hyperlink-is-underlined.md). ## Examples 下图演示了样式使用线性渐变画笔和虚线的笔的文本修饰。The following illustration shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen. ![采用线性渐变下划线的文本修饰](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "采用线性渐变下划线的文本修饰")![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") 示例中的下划线的样式使用线性渐变画笔和虚线的钢笔Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen 在下面的代码示例，通过用于虚线笔线性渐变画笔创建下划线文本修饰。In the following code example, an underline text decoration is created by using a linear gradient brush for the dashed pen. [!code-csharp[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#textdecorationsnippets3)] [!code-vb[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#textdecorationsnippets3)] [!code-xaml[TextDecorationSnippets#TextDecorationSnippets3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextDecorationSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#textdecorationsnippets3)]
